creator: philip.nortey@corizon.com
text:
A "thread watcher" listener would be a very useful addition to JMeter. The 
thread watcher will display the status of all running threads as either 
RUNNING or STOPPED. It will be possible to right-click on a thread status and 
either START or STOP a thread depending on what state it is currently in. This 
will allow failures to be analyzed during a test and restart the affected 
thread.

Mercury LoadRunner has similar functionality.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 36378 ***
